revised_title: An Improved Instrument for Producing Monochromatic Light of Any Desired Wavelength and Its Application in Crystallography
tldr: The authors present an improved instrument for producing monochromatic light of any desired wavelength, which allows for more accurate optical investigations of crystals. The device uses a single prism with high dispersive power and a fixed exit slit, enabling the illumination of the observing instrument's field with a range of spectrum colors.
